column2: @appssharath221 @snsachinnandu You‚Äôre wrong. When Gujarat was flooded years ago, our then CM, @narendramodi visited flood affected areas in rescue boats to survey damages and assist with relief efforts. Look how far he has come today, as PM of the world‚Äôs Largest democracy! We only get what we choose.

Also two years ago , I was rescued out of my car which got stuck on the ramp to join the interstate/Beltline. That happened during a sudden flash flood in the area . Today reminded of that - only it was far worse weather wise

It hasn‚Äôt rained this hard since our wedding day 30 years ago. 30 years ago today we got married and it fell a flood - tonight is no different. We may be here a while. 30 years ago I married my sweetheart-... https://t.co/1ZVF4Yb0xL

The most devastating flood in Eastern U.S. History continued its relentless hammering of New E‚Ä¶
column3:
63 Years Ago - Aug  20, 1955:
The most devastating flood in Eastern U.S. History continued its relentless hammering of New England.  
8.15 inches in 24 hours at Westfield, MA a state record
8.40 inches in 24 hours in Boston a record for the City
67 dead https://t.co/GQnz5QSULm

column2:
@zehnasseb Colleagues in my organization have donated their 30 days salary to Kerala Relief Fund. Few of them from Bihar as well. What did Kerala give to Bihar in last year's flood when casualty was twice as much? Not a single rupee.
Life outside social media is peaceful & people r united.

column2: @DrKumarVishwas Five years ago, people donated generously for terrible flood in my area in Uttarakhand. The money never reached people. For my 15 Lakh loss, I was given 3750 Rs...a joke.  Money used perhaps for elections.  The govt. even refused to support the broken bank. I live in danger. https://t.co/MDJ78ulviW

column2:
I have been asked repeatedly if I get the moral of the Noah story. 
It is this. 
A writer can lie and say there was a global flood circa 4344 years ago. 
If that story is then attached to a religion, people become too afraid of gods wrath to see it as the lie that it is.

I still see some posters ABVP published last year on the name "Chalo Keral".
But now when kerala really need someone those posters and slogans are missing.
#kerala
#flood
#savekerala

@timesofindia what about bihar then? last year 500+ people died there. almost every year it faces flood. Same about Himachal n uttrakhand. These states didn't get much support from other states, whereas almost every state has helped kerala. Special package should be given to these states 1st.

*sighs*

Last night was rough.

Today is a new day.

I think I will refrain from the constant negativity today.

I think I got enough out of my system for a year's worth of pain.

Let forgiveness flood my heart & peace guide me to a better place.

Good morning world.
